Package de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.components

Contains different UI-Components that are often used in the application.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConfirmationWindow.ButtonCancelListener This interface will be triggered, when the cancel-button was clicked.
ConfirmationWindow.ButtonOkListener This interface will be triggered, when the submit-button was clicked.
 

Class Summary
ComPlace A component for D&D purposes to represent a place.
ConfirmationWindow A window that asks the user for confirmation of the current action.
ImageManager A component to manage images, that are linked to Property objects.
QualificationField A field to manage all qualifications linked to an object.
QualificationWindow A window to manage all Qualification objects.
SquadTypeWindow A window to manage all SquadType objects.
SubmitButton Deprecated. Will be removed for stable version.
TagField Extends the TokenField to better match the application and translate it.
Unit A component for D&D purposes to represent a place.
UnitList A component for D&D purposes to represent a unit inside a list.
 

Package de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.components Description

Contains different UI-Components that are often used in the application.
